Chula_Vista.Douglas & Nancy Barnhart Cancer Center: The Douglas & Nancy Barnhart Cancer Center at Sharp Chula Vista Medical Center is a comprehensive cancer treatment center in Chula Vista, California, in the United States. The Barnhart Cancer Center at Sharp Chula Vista is part of Sharp HealthCare, in San Diego, California. The Barnhart Cancer Center features a full range of cancer services from diagnosis to treatment and recovery.
